title: Lightning Bugs, Fireflies - Call Them What You Will, They're Awesome
description: There are thousands of species of lightning bug and they live all over the world except in Antarctica. Maddie and Emily discuss lots of other amazing tidbits about the family Lampyridae and talk about what humans can do to preserve the bugs, which are facing widespread habitat disruption.

itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: The incredible world of lightning bugs and what people need to do to keep these twinkle butts around.
